readingKunHtml: <primary>かたわ</primary>, わき, おか, <primary>はた</primary>, <primary>そば</primary>
sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> is <radical>stand</radical>ing funny, facing a <radical>direction</radical> <kanji>nearby</kanji>. He can't go far because there's obviously something wrong with his feet. He's stuck nearby, very close to your side.
meaningInfo: Picture the leader very close to your side. He's looking off into the distance, a distance he'll never get to because all he can do is stand there with his messed up feet.
readingMnemonic: You decide to bring the leader to a <kanji>nearby</kanji> <reading>bow</reading>ling (<ja>ぼう</ja>) alley. It's really close and you can stay right by his side as he throws bowling balls and gets his anger out.
readingInfo: Picture the leader bowling nearby. You keep him close by, you never know when he'll fall over and need your help.
